description:
A hard charging, powder slaying freeride ski for everyday powder poaching and big mountain ripping. Versatile and floaty, this ski is built for aggressive skiers who arrive first to get the goods. With a 115mm waist, it delivers all mountain performance and lets you head into the chop with confidence. No matter what conditions you’re in, you’re sure to have a smile on your face with these underfoot.

  • Lightweight Poplar wood and fibreglass core feels light underfoot but still has good shock absorption and stability
  • Semi cap sidewall construction with carbon fiber and Kevlar laminates for torsion and flex control
  • Long side cut for stability at high speeds
  • Double rocker tip and tail with medium classic camber underfoot
  • Floaty 115mm waist finds itself at home in deep snow
  • Progressive flex at tip and tail, firmer flex at contact points for performance and stability on any snow type
  • Sintered graphite base is fast and very durable
name: Black Crows Anima 115 Skis - Unisex
